Schedule Advising Appointments through OneDePaul. Bio and Research Information Andre Berthiaume has been an Assistant Professor at DePaul University since September 1997. He earned a B.S. in Math/Computer Science, an M.S. and a Ph.D. in Computer Science from the University of Montréal. He worked as a post-doctoral researcher at Netherlands National Research Center in Mathematics and Computer Science (Centrum voor Wiskunde en Informatica, in Amsterdam) in 1995-1996 and at AT&T Labs as in 1996-97.
